label: Task-6
title: Create index page linking all interview resources
description: Create a publication at publications/articles/2026-02-10__stakeholder-interview-index.md that links to: the original ChatGPT voice brief, the raw interview transcript, the LinkedIn article ('I Was Just Interviewed by ChatGPT on Behalf of One of My Claude Code Agents'), all 9 role responses (Dev, Architect, QA, AppSec, DevOps, Librarian, Cartographer, Historian, Conductor), the Librarian catalog entry, the Historian narrative, and the Journalist synthesis article. This becomes the one-stop page for the stakeholder to read everything. This is a Phase 3 task that depends on all Phase 1 and Phase 2 tasks being completed first.
